Introduction
This topic contains information on the effect of a discontinued Survivors Pension award on other beneficiaries, including
entitlement of
in-custody children
, and
out-of-custody children
remarriage of the surviving spouse
, and
discontinuance of a child's award
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H - Adjustments Based on Changes in Status
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section H
